title: IPv6 Address Normalizer
description: Normalize IPv6 addresses to their canonical RFC 5952 format with compression and case standardization.

input.label: IPv6 Addresses
input.help: Enter IPv6 addresses (one per line) in any valid format. Supports compressed notation (::), mixed case, leading zeros, and zone IDs.

rfc.title: RFC 5952 Normalization
rfc.description: This tool normalizes IPv6 addresses according to RFC 5952 guidelines:

rules.lowercase: Convert all hexadecimal digits to lowercase
rules.leadingZeros: Remove leading zeros from each 16-bit group
rules.compression: Use :: to compress the longest run of consecutive zero groups
rules.singleZero: Represent single zero groups as '0' not '0000'

tooltips.normalizeHelp: Convert IPv6 addresses to their canonical RFC 5952 format
tooltips.copyAllHelp: Copy all normalized addresses to clipboard
